name: DEMON DASH
description:
Demon Dash was created in 3 days as a submission for the Ludum Dare 33 game jam weekend; with the theme of "You are the monster". After playing the game you will quickly realise that being a monster is an extremely fun and button mashingly exhausting task.

Play online with your friends, against other players or just go solo! Hope you enjoy it and please tell me what you think! Should I carry on working on this game? Create more maps? LET ME KNOW!!

My Ludum Dare submission:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Demon Dash was created by one developer, @OfficialWoaka from @AvalancheGames_ #ludumdare #LD33

edit: The timelapse of me making Demon Dash is finally uploaded, here's the link:
